Trade/Device Name(s): Puritan Fecal Opti-Swab Collection and Transport System
Puritan Fecal Opti-Swab™ Collection and Transport System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Puritan Fecal Opti-Swab Collection and Transport System for collection and transport of fecal and rectal swab specimens to maintain viability of enteric bacteria.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for collection and transport of clinical fecal and rectal swab specimens to preserve viability of enteric bacteria during transport from collection site to the testing laboratory for bacteriological examination and culture.
